loveQuotes.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. It's about how much you love each other every single day.
loveQuotes.author: Unknown

loveQuotes.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
loveQuotes.author: Maya Angelou

loveQuotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
loveQuotes.author: Helen Keller

loveQuotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
loveQuotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

loveQuotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
loveQuotes.author: David Viscott

loveQuotes.quote: Love is an endless mystery, for it has nothing else to explain it.
loveQuotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore
